name: Linguistically Enhanced Sound File
summary: Learn about .LWV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LWV files are used by Microsoft Agent, a program for creating conversational interfaces for applications and Web pages.

description: Audio file, similar to a .WAV file, that has been enhanced with the Microsoft Linguistic Information Sound Editing Tool (LISET); typically has modified phonemes that give the voice in the audio file greater articulation.
